content.title: Agent Hierarchy Reorganization Successfully Completed
content.description: Successfully reorganized agent hierarchy into three-tier system with 10 core system agents and 6 project-specific agents.
achievements: Created 10 core system agents: Documentation, Ticketing, Version Control, QA, Research, Ops, Security, Engineer, Data Engineer, Architect
Moved 6 non-core agents to project-specific tier: Orchestrator, Integration, Code Review, Performance, UI/UX, Data
Agent hierarchy validation passes with 100% success rate
Hierarchical agent loader successfully discovers all agents
Three-tier precedence system working correctly: Project → User → System
benefits: Cleaner separation of core vs project-specific functionality
Better agent discovery and loading system
Clear precedence hierarchy for agent resolution
Framework-level agents available to all projects
lessons_learned: Agent discovery system works well with Python file analysis
Proper separation of concerns improves framework organization
Memory collection integration is essential for continuous improvement
